detaileddescription.para: Swap words in one crypto block (16-bytes)
Swap the data-endian in one crypto block (16-bytes)
Calculate HASH before doing crypto operation
Calculate HASH after doing crypto operation
The crypto algorithm is not supported
The hash algorithm is not supported

briefdescription.para: Set the Crypto Key Index in SDP.

briefdescription.para: Write SDP key to specified SDP Key RAM.
Write the HASH digest result to SDP.
Read the HASH digest result from SDP.
Write the cipher IV to SDP.

length of the memory for memset operation

simplesect.para: API execution status. status_success or status_invalid_argument

briefdescription.para: Finish the HASH calculation and output the digest.
Wait until the SDP operation gets done.
Trigger SDP operation via the specified SDP packet description.

simplesect.para:
1. The Command Packet List should be in non-cacheable memory
This is a non-blocking API, users should confirm whether action completed or not by checking STA register in SDP
